title: Viral Feta & Tomato Pasta
description: The incredibly popular and easy baked feta pasta that took over social media. A perfect weeknight dinner.
instructions: Place cherry tomatoes in a baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat.
Place the block of feta cheese in the center of the tomatoes.
Bake for 30 minutes, until tomatoes are bursting and feta is soft.
Meanwhile, cook pasta according to package directions.
Remove dish from oven. Smash the feta and tomatoes with a spoon to create a creamy sauce. Stir in minced garlic and fresh basil.
Drain the pasta, reserving a little pasta water. Add the cooked pasta to the sauce and stir to combine. Add pasta water if needed to thin the sauce.

title: Vegan Chickpea Salad
description: A refreshing and protein-packed vegan salad perfect for meal prep or a light lunch.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine drained chickpeas, diced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 2 days.

title: High-Protein Quinoa Bowl
description: A nutritious and filling quinoa bowl loaded with veggies and protein.
instructions: Rinse quinoa under cold water. Cook according to package instructions.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add diced bell pepper, zucchini, and corn. Sauté until tender.
In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, sautéed vegetables, black beans, and avocado.
Drizzle with lime juice and season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine.
